title: If men decide to subdue women again, as they did in the past, can women prevent that from happening? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Women can absolutely prevent that from happening. All we have to do is refuse. But here’s the thing. Men benefit from a more egalitarian society. Everyone is happier when people are not controlled by one another.

Good question. Liberals won't allow that to happen considering that they call it rape when a man compliments a woman without permission. With the current political mindset, I don't see any chance of it getting better. Unless violence is used.
